review_data.good_description: EverythingÂ¸Â Room,pier, hotel bar/pool,staff, location(Embarcadero cove). This is one of the best hotels I've ever stayed in.
review_data.bad_description: Our shower knobs we're strip a bit but they came to fix it. Being from TX breakfast is usually a big meal. Their were a lot of simple healthy choices at this hotel.

review_data.good_description: Waterfront View and front desk staff.  He was friendly and my check in process was fast.
review_data.bad_description: I'm tall (6 feet). I would not have chosen to stay here had I known the bed would be almost on the floor.  It was difficult getting up from the bed because it was so low to the ground. My room also smelled funny.

review_data.good_description: Very comfortable room. Good breakfast. Free parking.
